data.title: MEETS KUNLE AFOLAYAN'S ADORABLE FAMILY
data.meta_description: Ace Producer and actor, Kunle Afolayan is one of the men in the movie industry that is blessed with adorable family. He is not just a man w...
data.text:
Ace Producer and actor, Kunle Afolayan is one of the men in the movie industry that is blessed with adorable family. He is not just a man who loves his craft, he is also one who loves and treasures his family.

Kunle who is one of the top producers per excellence in Nigeria knows how to keep his family going despite his busy schedule.

He is multi-tasked, recall that in October the Ace producer helped his wife to pound yam to entertain his guests, which shows that he is a typical African man who is down to earth.

He shared the picture of his lovely family on his IG page as he captioned it,” 'Awon temi! #family#adeloveremembrance #afolayan #blood”.

He is blessed with his beautiful wife, Tolu Afolanyan and two handsome boys and two pretty girls.

SOURCE: Nigeriafilm.com
